issue.title: [Python] Struct types are unhandled in AppendNdarrayItem when converting from a Python sequence to Arrow array in python_to_arrow.cc
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9610](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9610). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/cpp/src/arrow/python/python_to_arrow.cc#L759

and mailing list discussion

https://lists.apache.org/thread.html/r0a42d315df94997b7a01488d8309a0ad8f3b63997b8b29fdfb23932e%40%3Cuser.arrow.apache.org%3E
